page.title: 04Religions in Stockwell Sch.
page.content: We did a survey on the religions of the 3rd & 4th years in our school and came up with some very interesting results. There are 26 children in the 3rd year class, of these 13 are Christians, 8 are Muslims, 4 are Buddhists and 1 is a Sikh. 9 out of the 13 christians go to church. All of the 8 muslims attend mosques scattered around London like Baker Street and Regents park. The Buddhists all worship at home and the sikh goes to a temple in Stratford. There are 43 children in the two 4th year classes. Of these 26 are Christians, 14 are Muslims and 3 are Atheists (they do not believe in God) 14 out of the 26 christians go to church and 11 out of the 14 muslims go to Mosques some distance from their homes. The Atheists do not go to a church or a Mosque.
